extDescription.message: Download ended Live (Windows OS only)! Allows viewing and downloading Instagram™ Stories from desktop. Watch live videos.

errorZip.message: Error getting Zip file. Most likely you tried to download too many files within your Internet connection speed or computer power. Try to reduce count of files to make it works or retry in few seconds. Sometimes Instagram™ servers getting stuck on a lot of requests.

download_post_live_warning.message: Instagram™ doesn’t support downloading finished lives. But our downloader can do it.

download_post_live_error.message: Error when getting file. Try again in few time

post_live_loader_for_one_time.message: This software was generated specifically for you and for downloading this live only. It will be removed after file downloading finished.

trust_us_text.message: When launching downloader you might see the screen like below. To start downloading follow instructions shown in picture.

disconnect_notification.message: Refresh this page to continue using Downloader for Instagram™ Stories
